about me

I'm a fullstack software engineer from Nairobi, Kenya. I design,code, and tinker with things. I speak Php, Javascript, nodeJs and sass. I love to read, travel and explore.

Besides coding am also a technical support engineer and Microsoft 365 administrator. See description below
